title: Saudi Arabia and the Future of Golf
description:
Shukri and John analyze the new, controversial golf league, which is funded by Saudi Arabia, and discuss some big questions. Is golf going to change forever? Is the western media hypocritical? Is the PGA afraid of globalization? These questions and many more are discussed, and the Class X guys analyze an NY Times article called: This Is Uncomfortable: Saudi Arabia Upends Genteel World Of Pro Golf". 

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
dc:creator: Shukri Rashid
